text: Cristina Hidalgo (born April 05, 1997) is an Ecuadorian model and beauty pageant titleholder who was crowned Miss Ecuador 2019 on July 19, 2019 in Guayaquil. She will represent Ecuador at Miss Universe 2019. ==Early life== Cristina Hidalgo was born in 1997 in Guayaquil, Guayas Province. She is a national model, and she study public relations. Cristina has as advocacy to work with children and the elderly. ==Miss Ecuador 2019== Cristina represented her province in Miss Ecuador 2019 among 20 other contestants in Guayaquil where she resulted as winner on July 19, 2019. ==Miss Universe 2019== Cristina Hidalgo will represent Ecuador at Miss Universe 2019 since she gained the right to compete in the international pageant as Miss Ecuador 2019. ==References== == External links == * Official Miss World Ecuador website Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Miss Ecuador Category:People from Guayaquil Category:Ecuadorian beauty pageant winners Category:Miss Universe 2019 contestants
title: Cristina Hidalgo
